Name: FIGHTING PUDDING
About the game: Pudding that fell into hell when a human ate him right before creating a girlfriend. Let's escape from hell with the power of your unrelenting anger. Pudding Guy, the avenger from Hell, will he succeeds in revenge. Will you be able to make the girlfriend you wanted so much? Defeat the monsters of Hell with the energy of Hell, Let's escape! FIGHTING PUDDING? - This game is very difficult. - Extreme control shooting game! - Defeat incoming enemies and defeat the boss. - Try your physical. - Test your brain physicality! - This game doesn't have a save feature. - This game has a continue feature. - If you clear it, you can see the ending of the story. - Let's overcome commands that change frequently! - Defend and avoid constant attacks and clear the stage. - If you clear it, you can register the ranking. Good luck!
